overview: A talentless online personality tries to cobble together an action movie, alongside a half-witted team of incapable morons, and faces the hard truth that fame and fortune don’t always bring success. Mr.Bigshot is a viral star who is completely out of his league. Brontolov is a washed-up alchoholic who’s just trying to get paid. Eugine is a passionate filmmaker attempting to make connections. Frank is a Hallmark movie actor with three raspberry awards under his belt. They make a movie together – what could possibly go wrong? What ensues is a spiralling mess of a production, filled with deception, egos and vodka.
tagline: A talentless online personality tries to cobble together an action movie.
title: Mission: Improbable
